13.content:
"God, I would really like to become an object for you." he made you reply.
You were thankful about it, being an object meant being immobile and without duties, if he would've shrunk you, your tasks would be everything you hate- licking and kissing his feet or junk, depending on where he'd put you. Maybe he would make you clean out his nose or butt, the would be no way of telling for sure.

"Ok, you got to decide what I do to you, now I get to decide what I turn you into!"
'As always' you thought to yourself as you felt your body stretching and reforming until you fell onto the ground.
You were able to tell that you became a sock- simply by experience, this was far from the first time he made you his sock.
"Today I have P.E. in school, I hope you are as excited as I am about being drenched in my foot sweat." God said with a slight giggle.

He simply put you on his foot before standing up. It was still wired for you- your face stretched itself over the complete inside of the sock, it was the same for his taste buds, he did this so that you were able to smell, taste and see his foot from all sides simultaneous.
For now it was acceptable, he loved doing this- he linked your sense of smell and taste to the amount of sweat he produced, the more he sweats the more you suffer.

But now you got some time to drift into thought- you think about your life.. when god was born he was so sweet and innocent, just a baby- but no one knows how, but he did have a power over you, the power to change reality.. exclusively for you.

It started when God turned 4, he desperately wanted some kind of action figure, your parents denied him, but found him playing with said action figure at home, a few hours later they figured out that YOU were the action figure, somehow God managed to transform you into an action figure and back.
Your Parents had it under control at first, they forbid him to transform you, and God listened to him... while they were around. When they left he would "play" with you again and contentiously or not, made it so that you wouldn't be able to talk about it to anyone.

When he became 9 or 10 God started to become cruel instead of playful, he was old enough to finally understand that you were at his mercy, you were his slave, his property, his toy... something that he owned! And that's where your life drastically changed to the worse.
Your parents couldn't do anything about this, if they dragged you out of his room, he would just teleport you back.
If they locked him in his room, he just made you extremely strong and made you bust open the door.
If they begged him to let you live in peace, he erased you from existence and asked them if they were happy now.
Your parents did what they could, but there was nothing they could do in the first place, that's why you don't hate them.
From the point where your parents gave up completely your days would always start the same- with Gods feet on your face, then he'd do what ever he thought would be the most fun at this moment.
Transform you in a toilet and shit down your throat- or skip the transforming part and shit in you directly
He might shrink you, make you indestructible and sit and step on you for hours
When he feels like it, he might have your body crave the smell of his feet, the taste of his piss or the feeling of his ass on your face.. then he'd let you beg him for hours, while your mind tells you that it's wrong and your body tells your that you need it to survive.

One day, on your birthday, he came up with some other Idea:
He talked to your parents and told them that he'd let you go and erase every memory of him torturing you, so they had to pretend everything is like always.
You woke up in a bed, with a grin on your face, you walked down stairs, greeted by your parents and your brother that hugged you and told you happy birthday.
You got gifts, a cake, etc.
And your God seemed to have bought you shoes. He gave you the shoe box, you opened it and suddendely your world became pitch black. You got absorbed into one of the shoes' insole. Not of a new shoe, no you became the insole of his grime filled, worn out sport shoe and he made it so that with every step he took, one memory would return to you, until by 8pm you remembered everything.
Then at midnight he transformed you back, put his feet on your nose, looked you into the eyes and said:
"There is no reason to celebrate your birthday. After all it was such a sad day, after all you had to wait for my birth to give your life a meaning."

Your thoughts got interrupted by the smell going up, God seemed to be walking to school now.
